katahou no mimitabu de kiku sotsugyou no canon

dareka no sei ni shitai yo
kanashikutte naite bakkari itara me ga tokete nakunatta
aki ni nari mata fuyu ni nari hitotsu toshi wo totta
tooku made nigete iru tsumori demo owaranai kimi no story
sugari nagara oikakete mitemo ashige ni saretemo
My hometown lay buried in snow the morning I was born.
I looked up at the blue sky with my tiny hands.
The face of the girl next door that I have known so well...
It is as familiar as the graduation canon.
Thriving in solitude has been mistaken as my life story.
I want to blame it on someone.
Tears and sorrow caused me to miss my chance.
Autumn passed, winter came again, and I became a year older.
You think you have run far away, but your story never ends.
Even if I have to cling to you, chase after you, and get kicked down...
I will show you how to make them stop.
This is a special technique that I learned from my best friend in college.
No, you need to stretch your neck more, and put your mouth on the opposite side.
The problem with this technique is its difficulty.
Oh, now that I think about it, Rika used to spill all the time, too.
Shoot, hold on for a bit, Hagu.
I will go get you another cup.
We will give it another try.
I hear that you will die if you hiccup a hundred times in a row.
Uh oh, you only have 96 more left to live!
Hey, hey, you are hiccuping too fast!
You only have 45 more left to live!
He said that I will die if I hiccuped a hundred times in a row...
Here, try drinking from each side...
I learned it from my dad.
This will make them stop most of the time.
kimi ni aeta natsugumo ni natta I became a summer spider and met you.
Lying around, we wrapped around each other on the web...
kaze no you ni sukoshi dake yurenagara...wavering slightly in the wind.
I am in love with you.
Since then, Hagu-chan started avoiding me for some reason.
machi no sumi no dobugawa ni atta I floated down the drainage ditch at the edge of town...
kowaresou na sasabune ni notte nagareta...on a rickety bamboo leaf boat...
The words had just slipped out.
kiri no you ni kasuka ni kienagara...slowly fading away like the fog.
Although I knew what her answer would be...
Maybe I should not have said it?
hitori wo wasureta sekai ni mizushibuki haneagete Splashing water on a world that is forgotten about loneliness...
But I do not regret it all.
I always thought that I would regret it if I said it.
bata ashi ooki na sugata ga oyogidasu...kicking through the water, a large shape begins to swim.
I look up at the sky and it is so beautiful.
kimi ni aeta natsugumo ni natta I became a summer spider and met you.
Lying around, we wrapped around each other on the web...
kaze no you ni sukoshi dake yurenagara...wavering slightly in the wind.
And this overwhelming presence that nonetheless complements the plant's expression!
And to top it off, it is huge!
We are glad to hear you like it.
I wonder if it was a little too big?
He is usually a difficult person to deal with, but he talked with us for such a long time.
It is thanks to the vase that you made, Yamada-san.
Oh, no, I do not deserve the praise, Rika-san.
I wonder what she looks like through Mayama's eyes?
Does he look at her with an aching heart, longing to touch her shoulder and her pale cheeks?
What sound does his heart make when it strains?
What emotions does he hold in while he is at that office?
Here are some towels and paper towels.
Please roll up the paper towels and put them in your shoes.
And here is some hot tea for you.
Something tells me I should not be too thrilled to hear that.
Oh, and Rika-san, once you are done drinking, please go to your bedroom and get some rest.
We are waiting for Mori-san's check, but it will probably be after 11 of the clock before he contacts us.
You did not sleep last night, right?
You were drawing blueprints in your room until morning.
I could hear your computer chair.
And Mayama was listening below Rika-san's room the entire time...
Based on past patterns, it will be close to midnight before Mori-san sends us the data.
Please get some rest instead of waiting around while doing nothing.
If there are any pressing matters, I will call your cell phone to wake you up.
Then I guess I will get some rest.
Our next appointment is on Wednesday, but we have some things to take care of before then...
Oh, Yamada and I will make that file, so please do not worry about it.
Before we get to work, why do not we order dinner?
Yes, a triple L magnum deluxe.
What do you usually talk about, Mayama?
I wonder if it will be sunny tomorrow?
Or, Do you think the typhoon will come our way?
Or, What model should we choose for our new laptop?
Well, when I think about it, it seems like we only talk about work and the weather, but...
But she does not talk that much, to begin with...
But have not you been working together for four years already?
Is it strange that we do not really talk about anything?
There is a lot of people here.
It is a school, after all.
So everyone here is trying to become an artist or find other creative jobs?
I do not think there is that much demand for them out there.
People like our father are rare.
You must think that as well.
No, you understand because it is you.
In terms of funds, we are almost there.
But I want to push through in one go, Shinobu.
What did you used to talk about with Rika-san?
You have been going to Rika's to help out, right?
Back when we were students, I was always talking to Rika about the books that I read.
Actually, I was the only one talking.
Biographies of artists, historical background of an art piece...
Whenever we were alone, Rika would say, Please tell me about something.
It was hard for me to always have something to talk about.
Well, I did like books, so I was actually happy to have someone to talk about them with.
I would be in the library every day going through art textbooks.
There was even a time when a professor mistook me as being studious.
Hanamoto-kun, you are a model student of the arts!
You are the only one who seriously studies art history!
Sensei, I am in a hurry!
Well, I am here thanks to things like that though.
By the way, why are you asking?
Um, well, whenever I am alone with Rika-san, things get quiet.
I was wondering what I could do about it.
You do not need to worry.
The more she gets used to you, the less she speaks.
When she was with Harada, she almost never spoke.
They got along very well, but they were always just hanging out together.
Rika, you see, speaks less when she is with someone she likes.
She speaks less when she is with someone she likes.
Is it strange that we do not really talk about anything?
I am not going to tell you...
Two pieces of 1A and two pieces of 5C.
They would like those pieces for their store in Kamakura.
We will take a look at the store next week.
You might be able to quit your school job and make a living doing this.
I am still using the school's kiln, after all.
Now then, we will need a file for the pieces and a mold...
What is the matter with Rika-san?
She is not coming back from the kitchen.
I wonder if she is not feeling well?
Drink the water from the opposite end of the cup.
What should we do about food?
We used to do this back home to stop them.
Please take my word for it and give it a try.
So you are going to Rika-san's, after all?
You are going out of your way to burn the sight of them together into your eyes.
But you should go, if that is what you need to do to get over it.
She speaks less when she is with someone she likes.
But they were always just hanging out together.
On top of that, they are all extra large?
This is good enough for me.
Oh, Rika-san, it is okay if you cannot eat it all.
You are going to get an upset stomach.
I mean, I need to get nutrients.
I need to work hard on my job.
So that no matter how precious someone else is to you...
So that my heart will not be crushed...
Is it strange that we do not really talk about anything?
She speaks less when she is with someone she likes.
But you should go, if that is what you need to do to get over it.
You should go and cry your heart out.
I am never going to help push you forward!
It would be so much easier...
sorezore no michi wo yuku sono wakaremichi
At the crossroads where we split ways...
mou nidoto au koto no nai deai wa kanashisugiru
Despite adding the emotions that are lacking...
ittai itsumade onaji kotoba wo kakaekondenda
